abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Education Project will
            finance the foreign exchange costs of (i) the extension and
            further equipping of the Schools of Education and
            Engineering of the University of Zambia; and (ii) the
            construction and furnishing of student hostels, including
            staff housing, to accommodate the increased registration in
            these schools.

Transcript of meeting of the Executive
            Directors of the IBRD and IDA, held on Tuesday, November 18,

abstracts.cdata!:
This partial transcript, from the
            session of the Executive Directors of the International Bank
            for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) and International
            Development Association (IDA) held on Tuesday, November 19,
            1969 covers only the discussion on the Second Education
            Project for Zambia.
